member.name: IGraphicsCaptureItemInterop.CreateForMonitor
member.summary: Targets a monitor(s) for the creation of a graphics capture item.
member.param: The monitor handle that represents the monitor to capture.
GUID for the type returned. Supported value: GraphicsCaptureItem.
Out pointer for the object to receive.

member.name: IGraphicsCaptureItemInterop.CreateForWindow
member.summary: Targets a single window for the creation of a graphics capture item.
member.param: The window handle that represents the window to capture.
GUID for the type returned. Supported value: GraphicsCaptureItem.
Out pointer for the object to receive.

member.name: IGraphicsCaptureItemInterop
member.summary: Desktop interop interface for the GraphicsCaptureItem activation factory.
